title: Beautiful, Big Remodeled w/PARKING- A+++ Location
posting_body: Welcome to the tranquility and calm of the Inner Sunset!
This spacious, quiet apartment in one of the most elegant pre-war  buildings in the Inner Sunset has everything you could want in a home.
Tucked into the second floor of a 4 story building, the thoughtful layout features:
--Formal entry with large living room that faces a beautifully landscaped courtyard (and includes a walk-in closet with  built in wooden dressers)
--Charming remodeled bathroom with an adjustable mirror and retro floor tiling
–Generous kitchen with new cabinetry, recently tiled floors and large dining area
–Roomy bedroom in the back of the flat with a bright airy corner window that faces northwest
–Original moldings (be sure to check out the gargoyles keeping sentry in the LR)
With the perfect mix of early 20th-century design and modern conveniences, this apartment offers the ideal San Francisco residence in a prime location.
The Inner Sunset is ideally situated for easy access to most neighborhoods in San Francisco.

1640 Kirkham is a short walk to everything Golden Gate Park has on offer including miles of trails (bike & walking), the de Young Museum, the San Francisco Botanical Garden, and the Koret Children's Quarter Playground and dozens of flower gardens and green space - perfect for gatherings, big & small.
The bustling Irving and Noriega Street shopping areas are packed with restaurants, bars, shops and grocery stores.
UCSF is a podcast away and the N-Judah is a block north.
For the adventurous, hike up the 16th Street Mosaic Tiles Steps to Grandview park and some the BEST views of the City!
